test_description: Verify automated routing of service request to Service Center based on GeoJSON polygon containment
business_risk: Critical - Misrouting causes SLA breaches and operational inefficiency
preconditions: PostGIS extension enabled; Service Center A has defined polygon; Service Center B has defined polygon; Brand X authorized for both
test_steps: 1. Create Service Request payload with lat/long inside Service Center A's polygon; 2. Submit POST /api/v1/service-requests; 3. Verify response assigns Service Center A; 4. Repeat with coordinates for Service Center B
expected_result: Routing engine correctly identifies polygon containment using ST_Contains and assigns correct ServiceCenterID
test_data_needs: GeoJSON polygons for test centers; Consumer coordinates inside/outside polygons
success_criteria: Routing occurs < 250ms; 100% accuracy on boundary edge cases
failure_impact: High - Service requests unassigned or assigned incorrectly
cleanup_requirements: Truncate service_requests table; Reset round-robin Redis keys
security_considerations: Validate input coordinates to prevent injection; Ensure tenant isolation

test_description: Verify offline job completion queue synchronization upon network restoration
business_risk: High - Data loss of service records and signatures
preconditions: Technician logged in; Jobs synced to WatermelonDB; Network disconnected
test_steps: 1. Disable network; 2. Mark job 'Resolved' locally; 3. Capture signature; 4. Re-enable network; 5. Verify background sync triggers
expected_result: Local changes persist; Sync engine uploads data sequentially; Server updates status to Resolved
test_data_needs: Assigned Service Request; Mock signature image blob
tools_required: Detox; Mock Server; Network Link Conditioner
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Sync completes within 30s of reconnection
failure_impact: Critical - Loss of proof of service
cleanup_requirements: Wipe local WatermelonDB; Reset server state
performance_expectations: UI remains responsive during background sync
accessibility_requirements: Sync status indicators announced to screen reader
